change.title: Soft Scope Cache
change.desc: The default cache now uses a Soft Reference design - the cache auto-tunes with no hard-limit imposed on the total number of cached items and has a more efficient cache weighting algorithm. Overall, the new cache is at least 3 times more efficient in memory use and has lower maintanence costs. Furthermore the soft reference design means that it is now impossible to create a bad configuration that in the past could have resulted in heap out-of-memory in extreme situations. After extensive performance analysis it was found that there is now no benefit and a disproportionate cost overhead associated with serialized L2 disk cache - therefore the L2 cache is no longer implemented. A small consequence of the cache changes is that the cache-view-tool only shows metadata about the cached resource and no longer allows the actual cached resource to be viewed.

change.title: XRL Recursion Algorithm
change.desc: The XRL accessor has been rewritten to use a single pass recursion which yields a speed-up of ~3x for large docs.

change.title: Component Lifecycle

change.title: Transreptor Coverage

change.title: XRL Documentation

change.title: Python Language Support
change.desc: Full support for modules containing either scripts of classes or both. Modules are compiled and stored in bytecode form inside the NetKernel cache. Dependency checking so that scripts and their results are invalidated and recompiled if a modules source is edited. Imports working from with NetKernel address space rather than filesystem. Both relative and absolute import resolution. Error handling integrated into NetKernels stack traces (i.e. Python stack traces appear properly format inside a NetKernel exception)

change.title: Linear Resource Accumulation

change.title: Dependency Visualization

change.title: JDBC Result Sets

change.title: CLOB Support

change.title: Log Level Persistence

change.title: XmlBean Object Model

change.title: Scripting Playpen
change.desc: The scripting playpen allows scipts to be tested/developed interactively.

change.title: Asynchronous processes with join
change.desc: active:asynch and active:join provide support for forking and joining asynchronous processes.

change.title: Fragmentation Services

XPointer is implemented as a Fragmentor for any XML resource and so XPointer URI fragments may be specified with any resource request.

change.title: Aspect Transreption
change.desc: The kernel will now create an aspect from the low-level binary stream if a high-level aspect-to-aspect transreption is not found.

change.title: Debugger super-stack
change.desc: The debugger now provides a view of the superstack for the stopped request.

change.title: Single Module Install Wizard
change.desc: The install wizard now supports installation of a single URI sourced module.

change.title: DPML Literals passed by reference
change.desc: DPML literals are now passed by reference with XPointer URIs.

change.title: Module Classloader

change.title: Module Installer Supports Rollback
change.desc: The module installer now supports rollback allowing module configuration to be reverted to a previous known state.

change.title: MailTransport

change.title: Image Utilities

change.title: SOAP Infrastructure

change.title: DOM2SAX and SAX2DOM Transreptors

change.title: Debugger Dependency Introspection
change.desc: The debugger now display the dependency hierarchy of resultant resources when a request is stopped post-execution.

change.title: Front-end Error Handler
change.desc: The front-end fulcrum now formats exceptions using a default error handler.

change.title: Transaction Report Enhanced
change.desc: New columns of total elapsed time and total local time have been added to the transaction report to aid performance tuning.

change.title: Kernel Error Handling
change.desc: Minor changes to the Kernel error handling to improve formatting when nesting NetKernelExceptions inside non-NetKernelExceptions

change.title: Documentation System Tuned
change.desc: The documentation system performance has been improved for the following cases: first document, subsequent documents, reindexing documents.

change.title: Front-end Fulcrum
change.desc: Some minor configuration changes were made to the Front End fulcrum.

change.title: Structured Documentation
change.desc: Based on user feedback the documentation has been completely restructured and improved.

change.title: HTTP Transport
change.desc: The HTTP transport has been refactored into a low-level HTTP transport and a high-level HTTP adaptor bridge. The bridge processes the raw HTTP request and response from the transport and provides high-level application support such as HTTP Header extraction, method type, parameter and query processing...

change.title: RDBMS Blob support
change.desc: mod_db now provides accessors for getting and setting RDBMS blobs

change.title: Faster Startup
change.desc: The post-boot Module Deployment Verification has been optimized

change.title: Deprecated create() factory methods on Aspect implementations
change.desc: The create factory methods have been deprecated. The old API convention was ambiguous as it generated a representation from a method on the aspect. This was contrary to the RAT abstraction.

change.title: Win32 URL Resource Loading
change.desc: The JDK 1.4.x has a bug in File.getURL() which fails to escape whitespace in a Win32 filename - this problem has been fixed.

change.title: Kernel Cache Manager
change.desc: The cache manager has been tweaked to support the L1, L2 caches

change.title: Cache
change.desc: The standard cache now has a file-based L2 cache. Cached resources are now automatically migrated from the in-memory L1 cache to the file-based L2 cache.

change.title: SMTP Server
change.desc: New SMTP Server module provides email message queue for Mulitpart MIME email messages.

change.title: DPML
change.desc: Set intermediate accessor added - by default DPML results are cacheable, this accessor allows a process to explicitly declare its result intermediate.

change.title: formURIEncode/Decode
change.desc: Utility accessors to encode/decode between NVP and x-form-url-encoded binary stream.

change.title: get/setURIQuery
change.desc: Utility accessors to get URI query parts as NVP and set query from NVP.

change.title: mod_db
change.desc: Some minor updates to the XML result set code. Configuration now supports separate user and password fields. HSQLDB embedded SQL database provided as lib for development/testing/demos.

change.title: XRL
change.desc: XRL mapper results are now cacheable - previously they defaulted to intermediate.

change.title: HTML Serializer
change.desc: Apostrophe escaping is now automatic for XHTML.

change.title: Doc Engine
change.desc: The dynamic menu generator has been improved.

change.title: Cache Performance Analysis Document
change.desc: A document presenting performance/cache trade-offs and cache optimizations.

change.title: HTTP
change.desc: Redirects now set expirey header.

change.title: Kernel Scheduler
change.desc: The Kernel scheduler now supports a debug API. It features improved deadlock prevention/detection. Scheduler thread management has also been improved.

change.title: Debugger
change.desc: A new debugger application enables detailed inspection and examination of request state.

change.title: XForms
change.desc: The XForms module now uses Chiba 0.9.4 for the XForm model. The controller interface has been extended to support submission/instance URIs

change.title: Session
change.desc: Revised session mapper adds throttle, variable timeout, prevents the potential of unbounded memory use.

change.title: attachDependency Acccessor
change.desc: Allows a dependent resource to be explicitly attached to another resource as a dependency.

change.title: Lucene Index
change.desc: The lucene XML indexer now supports additional named indexes.

change.title: WebDAV module
change.desc: A new WebDAV client module add accessors for interacting with a WebDAV repository.

change.title: Module Installer Fix
change.desc: The module installer now correctly provides version number on expanded JAR files.

change.title: DPML
change.desc: this:param / this:param:* / this:session:* now support EXISTS - means no longer need exception blocks to handle defaults.

change.title: HTTP Transport
change.desc: HTTP Status Codes now use correct defaults

change.title: XInclude
change.desc: Updated to be complient with latest W3C spec.

change.title: Documentation
change.desc: Some errata fixes in documentation have been made.

change.title: NetKernel Control Interface
change.desc: All control operations of NetKernel are exposed via HTTP on port 1060. A control panel provides access to all NetKernel administration tools and services.

change.title: NetKernel v2.2.0 Hot/Cold Restart
change.desc: NetKernel now supports both Cold and Hot restart. Cold restart quickly reboots the entire OS stack without stopping the JVM however all transport requests are lost during the reboot. Hot Restart reboots the system and detects/installs new or updated modules based on version number - it preserves all transport requests so an application can be patched/upgraded with no loss of service

change.title: NetKernel v2.2.0 Memory Optimizations
change.desc: The Kernel and some XML modules have been optimized to minimize object creation - memory footprint can be up to 50% lower in some applications

change.title: NetKernel v2.2.0 Improved performance
change.desc: General optimization and refinements have provide significant performance gains.

change.title: NetKernel v2.2.0 Hot System Config
change.desc: The Kernel can now be configured at runtime - Threads counts, Throttle parameters, Housekeeping and many other Kernel settings can now be changed at runtime.

change.title: Dynamic Entrypoint Management
change.desc: A new entrypoint managment system is provided. All modules can now be dynamically deployed, there entrypoints will be detected and published on the admin interface. Documentation can be automatically discovered and indexed.

change.title: New Documentation System
change.desc: Documents are dynamically discovered in installed modules and full-text indexing is performed.

change.title: Front/Backend Fulcrums
change.desc: The system now ships with a front-end fulcrum which provides an HTTP transport on port 8080 - applications should be installed here. The backend fulcrum provides an HTTP transport on port 1060 and provides the NetKernel managment interface with control panel and documentation.

change.title: HTTP Proxy Configuration
change.desc: The HTTP proxy can now be set and modified at runtime

change.title: data: URIs supported
change.desc: The data: URI scheme is now supported. data: is a IETF draft URI type that enables in-line literal data to be placed in a URI.

change.title: Image Library Module
change.desc: A new set of image processing accessor provide useful utilities.

change.title: BootLoader
change.desc: The Kernel is now booted from a BootLoader. This enables the Kernel to be upgraded at runtime.

change.title: Runtime Inspection of System Log
change.desc: The System log can now be inspected interactively at runtime.

change.title: Transport View
change.desc: The current transport configurations can be viewed from the control panel

change.title: Improved Resource Trace Tool
change.desc: The resource trace tool has been enhanced - it can now issue a request and show the results

change.title: RDBMS Database Module
change.desc: A new suite of RDBMS database accessors has been added.

change.title: Trailmaps
change.desc: New demonstrations and worked examples are provided in the trailmaps section of the documentation.

change.title: DPML Cookbook
change.desc: This allows DPML examples to be tried out and enables interactive editing and execution of the DPML

change.title: Cummulative v Local Time on Transaction Report
change.desc: The transaction report now provides statistics on the local time a request spends in an accessor. This is useful for performance analysis.

change.title: Full XQuery Support
change.desc: XQuery implementation is now 100% compliant with the W3C XQuery specification. XQueries are now compiled and cached rather than interpreted.

change.title: Multiple Parameters in DPML
change.desc: DPML now allows any named argument to be provided to an instruction. This means that XSLT/XQuery can receive multiple parameters. It also enables accessors to be more flexible.

change.title: JMX Deprecated
change.desc: JMX has been deprecated though is still available for download. All administration is now provided by the HTTP admin interface on port 1060 - this is more flexible and also more secure as only the 1060 port needs to be locked down on a server. Also admin can now be tunnelled over SSH (not possible with JMX).

change.title: GoldenThread Accessors
change.desc: New accessors allow virtual URIs to be attached to any process result. The URI Golden Thread can be cut at any time and all dependent resources are instantly invalidated. Very useful for RDBMS and integration of legacy processing.

change.title: In-tray Transport
change.desc: A new transport allows an in-directory to out-directory processor. See PDF Distiller trailmap

change.title: HTTP Transport
change.desc: HTTP transport now supports file uploads.

change.title: Module GateKeeper
change.desc: A simple declarative way of adding security to a module. It provides zone-based access control using the requested URI.

change.title: Abstract Session Support
change.desc: The session module provides declarative mapping of HTTP Cookies to Session URIs and is extensible to other transport types.

change.title: Improved New-Module Wizard
change.desc: The new module wizard enables creation and installation of new modules. It has options to initialise features such as entrypoints and accessors. It automatically configures and installs a new module ready for a developer to populate it's services.

change.title: Install Wizard
change.desc: The install wizard connects to 1060.org to provide managements and installation of modules. New modules and applications can be installed dynamically.

change.title: Throttle View
change.desc: The transport throttle can now be inspected to see a dynamic view of server load and service levels.

change.title: Internal request support added to trace tool
change.desc: A checkbox has been added to the trace tool in ext_introspect to allow tracing an instruction that originates inside a module rather than one entering a module.

change.title: New XRL CMS solution
change.desc: Full extensible content management solution released. This is used to power the 1060 Research and 1060 org sites though is not yet integrated into the distribution documentation.

change.title: Denial of service attack defence increased
change.desc: The throttle works by limiting the maximum number of concurrent requests that the kernel will process. The excess requests are queued. This enhancement limits the size that the queue will grow to by returning a system busy exception quickly. This gives load buffering without the chance of unbounded queue sizes causing out-of-memory errors. Full configuration is available in system.xml

change.title: Servlet support added
change.desc: A Servlet is supplied which starts NetKernel and directs all requests to it. This is a useful deployment option for those who require servlet support.

change.title: Ext_xml module refactored
change.desc: The ext_xml [urn:org:ten60:netkernel:ext:xml] module has been refactored into ext_xml-core [urn:org:ten60:netkernel:ext:xml:core] which contains the core XML APIs and utilities and ext_xml-ura [urn:org:ten60:netkernel:ext:xml:ura] which contains only the standard XML accessors. This is cleaner and removes a number of circular dependencies.

change.title: file: sink support added to NewSimpleNetAccessor
change.desc: ext_layer1. Now supports sinking to file: URI's. Enables full filesystem interaction.

change.title: New trace tool with module context
change.desc: New trace introspection tool added. http://localhost:1060/introspect/trace. The trace accessor has been enhanced to enable traces to be issued in the context of a module.

change.title: New mod_cgi
change.desc: Added module to support CGI access from NetKernel. Includes support for PHP

change.title: New init process/system integrity check
change.desc: Added kernel support for a post boot, init process. Specified in system.xml. Salisbury distribution now does post boot system integrity check of all modules

change.title: New module dependency report
change.desc: A new introspection tool http://localhost:1060/introspect/dependencies allows module dependencies to be viewed.

change.title: New module wizard
change.desc: Added a new wizard to help create new modules.

change.title: New installer
change.desc: Moved to IzPack installer added improved package management, thanks to Julien Ponge for IzPack

change.title: Module Manager supports XAR *or* JARs
change.desc: Developers found it difficult to handle .xar archives with IDEs. The module manager now supports both .xar and .jar archived module extensions in a module directory. By default we now ship modules with .jar extension so that they can be easily mounted by IDEs.

change.title: Fixed cookie on localhost bug
change.desc: A simple configuration bug in the distribution modules meant that cookies on localhost broke the whole distribution.
